about_the_game:
A roguelite cooking game about a misfit chef running a small spaceship restaurant on the outskirts of space. Cook and serve your dishes, upgrade your kitchen equipment, and decorate your restaurant. Expand your culinary fame across the galaxy!

Cook and serve dishes

Cook over 50 different recipes from across the galaxy, from Nebula noodles to Sandworm soup. Put together a daily menu of unlocked dishes, cook the right meals for the right customers, profit!

Upgrade your kitchen

Purchase better cooking equipment to make shifts easier. Cooking equipment will be visible in your kitchen and provide bonuses, such as reducing ingredient costs, keeping customers patient for longer, increasing dish profits, or even enlarging your cooking grid.

Decorate your spaceship restaurant

Unlock and purchase decorations to customize the look and feel of your spaceship restaurant. Make it your own!

Build a culinary legacy across galaxies

Each galaxy has its own type of customers with unique needs, traders selling items, and visual environments. Discover what each galaxy has to offer and use it to your advantage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K (4 * 3500) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 5 2500U (4 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4096 MB) / Radeon RX 560X (4096 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
